# Support

## Having trouble?

Weâ€™d love to help!

### Questions & Discussions

For general questions about how to use MuseumSpark, please use [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/markhazleton/MuseumSpark/discussions).

### Bug Reports

If you believe you have found a bug, please create a report using our [Bug Report Template](https://github.com/markhazleton/MuseumSpark/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml).

### Feature Requests

Have a cool idea? Please check if it's already on our [Roadmap](site/src/pages/RoadmapPage.tsx) or in existing [Issues](https://github.com/markhazleton/MuseumSpark/issues). If not, submit a [Feature Request](https://github.com/markhazleton/MuseumSpark/issues/new?template=feature_request.yml).
